infoArray.name: alt
infoArray.desc: Used in combination with src or srcSet to provide an alt attribute for the rendered img element.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: Can be used, for instance, to render a letter inside the avatar.

infoArray.name: classes
infoArray.desc: Useful to extend the style applied to components.

infoArray.name: component
infoArray.desc: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

infoArray.name: imgProps
infoArray.desc: Properties applied to the img element when the component is used to display an image.

infoArray.name: sizes
infoArray.desc: The sizes attribute for the img element.

infoArray.name: src
infoArray.desc: The src attribute for the img element.

infoArray.name: srcSet
infoArray.desc: The srcSet attribute for the img element.
